document_data.name: Pride of Athkatla
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pride of Athkatla''' was an enclosed marketplace within the [[Temple District (Athkatla)|Temple District]] of [[Athkatla]] full of local vendors, well-versed in city's politics and local customs, who sold goods and wares for traveling merchants.
document_data.Description:
The Pride was comprised of rows upon rows of curtained boutiques and mercantile stalls. They were run vendors peddling goods from all around [[Faer√ªn]], anything from [[Tashalar]]an cheese to [[locksmith]]s' hardware. The marketplace was set within the entrance hall of a former temple of [[Savras]].

One of the more memorable shopkeepers in the Pride was [[Sulrajack]], a gregarious and silver-tongued covert informant who spied on Athkatlans for the [[Cowled Wizards]].
